data.title: A Canticle for Leibowitz Is a Big, Beautiful Mess
data.meta_description: The classic 1959 novel by Walter M. Miller Jr. is full of fascinating themes, but in hindsight not all of them are explored particularly well.
data.text:
The 29 Best Shows on Apple TV+ Right Now

Constellation, Presumed Innocent, and a Steve Martin documentary are among the best shows on Apple TV+ this month.

The 46 Best Movies on Netflix Right Now

Hit Man, Under Paris, and Godzilla Minus One are just a few of the movies you should watch on Netflix this month.

The 19 Best Movies on Amazon Prime Right Now

The Idea of You, Road House, and American Fiction are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Amazon Prime Video this week.

The 29 Best Movies on Hulu This Week

Origin, Anchorman, and Fight Club are just a few of the movies you need to watch on Hulu right now.

The Secret Telegram Channels Providing Refuge for LGBTQ+ People in Russia

In March, Russia named the "LGBT movement" an extremist organization. In response, activists, human rights groups, and others have used Telegram for support—and even to find resources to leave the country.

The 49 Best Shows on Netflix Right Now

Bridgerton, Scavengers Reign, and Sweet Tooth are just a few of the shows you need to watch on Netflix this month.

The 21 Best Movies on Apple TV+ Right Now

Fancy Dance, Argylle, Mad Max: Fury Road, and Blade Runner 2049 are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Apple TV+ this month.
